translation.en: [Johnny Cash] I thank God for all the freedoms we've got in this country.
translation.zh: ‎我感谢上帝赐予这个国家的人民自由

translation.en: -I cherish them. -[cheering continues]
Even the rights to burn the flag, you know, I'm proud of those rights.
translation.zh:
‎即使是焚烧国旗的权利
‎我为那些权利感到自豪

translation.en: -[crowd shouting, booing] -But I'll tell you what,
we've also got-- Let me tell you something. Shh.
translation.zh: ‎我们也有…让我告诉你们一件事

translation.en: We've also got a right to bear arms, and if you burn my flag, I'll shoot you.
translation.zh:
‎我们也有持有武器的权利
‎如果你焚烧我的国旗 我可以射你

translation.en: But I'll shoot you with a lot of love, like a good American.
translation.zh:
‎但我会用很多爱来射你
‎像个好美国人

translation.en: [Mark Stielper] In the '60s and '70s, America was torn apart
around issues of race, war, peace,
and a battle for the heart and soul of what it meant to be an American patriot.
translation.zh:
‎还有一场心灵之战
‎作为美国爱国者意味着什么

translation.en: [Nixon] We will determine what kind of nation America will be.
translation.zh: ‎我们将决定美国是什么样的国家

translation.en: [Cash] It's the prettiest country in the world that we've got.
-There ain't nothing like it anywhere. -[applause]
Mr. Nixon said Johnny Cash speaks to all America.
translation.zh:
‎尼克松先生称
‎约翰尼卡什能和全美国产生共鸣

translation.en: [Aram Bakshian] He understood Johnny Cash's symbolic importance.
translation.zh: ‎他理解约翰尼卡什重要的象征意义

translation.en: [Nixon speaking on tape] Country music is the Johnny Cash crowd.
-[aide] It gets you elected. -[Nixon] Yeah. You know, it's Southern.
translation.zh: ‎（尼克松总统秘密录音） ‎能让你当选 你知道 这里是南方

translation.en: [Pat Buchanan] Nixon wanted to identify with Middle America,
translation.zh: ‎尼克松想得到美国中产阶级的认同

translation.en: and Johnny Cash was as Middle America as you can get.
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼卡什是最好的中产阶级人选

translation.en: [Joanne Cash] We got a phone call from the White House. It was President Nixon.
translation.zh: ‎我们接到白宫的电话 是尼克松总统

translation.en: He had invited Johnny to sing and do a concert there.
translation.zh:
‎他邀请约翰尼献唱
‎并在那里开演唱会

translation.en: [Stielper] President Nixon requested that John sing
redneck country music songs,
affiliating country music with the president's cause,
translation.zh: ‎乡村音乐和总统的事业联系在一起

translation.en: and the result was just catastrophic.
How could the president be so mean-spirited?
Johnny was very, very conflicted.
It was a defining moment for him.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, Johnny Cash!
translation.zh: ‎女士们、先生们 有请约翰尼卡什

translation.en: Thank you very much.
[Stielper] Who was going to show up to the White House?
Johnny Cash of "Folsom Prison Blues,"
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什
‎代表作《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》

translation.en: "The Rebel"...
So, what do you want to hear?
[Stielper] ...the guy who was photographed flippin' off the man,
or the God-fearing family man with a baby on the way,
translation.zh:
‎或是即将当爸爸的
‎虔诚的居家男人

translation.en: gospel-singing Johnny Cash.
How do you be both?
What did Johnny Cash stand for?
Carl Perkins wrote a song that tells about the reason for it all.
translation.zh:
‎卡尔帕金斯写过一首歌
‎告诉了我们这一切的原因

translation.en: It takes us back home and again,
tells it like it was when I was a little-bitty kid
and we gathered around the piano,
and me and little brother would join in and Mama'd sing tenor and Daddy sang bass.
translation.zh:
‎我和弟弟会加入
‎妈妈唱高音 爸爸唱低音

translation.en: ♪ I remember when I was a lad Times were hard and things were bad... ♪
translation.zh: ‎我记得自己小时候 万事艰难

translation.en: Johnny was born in Kingsland,
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼在金士兰出生… ‎（乔安妮卡什
‎约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家）

translation.en: in south Arkansas.
translation.zh:
‎（乔安妮卡什
‎约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家） ‎…位于阿肯色州南部

translation.en: ♪ Just poor people That's all we were ♪
♪ Trying to make a living Out of black land dirt ♪
translation.zh: ‎想在肮脏的黑土地上讨生活

translation.en: ♪ We'd get together In a family circle singing loud... ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们团结在一起 一家人齐声高唱

translation.en: When my family came to Dyess, Johnny was three years old.
translation.zh: ‎我们一家人到戴斯的时候 ‎约翰尼才三岁

translation.en: ♪ Singin' seems to help a troubled soul ♪
translation.zh: ‎唱歌似乎能帮助受困的灵魂

translation.en: ♪ One of these days and it won't be long ♪
♪ I'll rejoin them in a song ♪
♪ I'm gonna join the family circle At the Throne ♪
translation.zh: ‎我会和家人团聚 在王座前

translation.en: [Cash] Now each one of these houses had a barn,
translation.zh:
‎（约翰尼卡什童年故居
‎阿肯色州戴斯） ‎每个房子都有谷仓

translation.en: a chicken house, and a smoke-house where the farmers raised their own hogs
translation.zh: ‎鸡舍和农民用来养猪的烟熏室

translation.en: and cured their meat.
And they had a mule and 20 acres of land here.
translation.zh: ‎他们还有一头骡子和120亩土地

translation.en: It was a beautiful little place.
The Dyess, Arkansas experience was part of FDR's New Deal.
translation.zh:
‎（马克史提普
‎约翰尼的朋友/家族历史学家） ‎阿肯色州戴斯的经验
‎是罗斯福新政的一部分

translation.en: They moved people from terrible situations where they had no hope, no future,
translation.zh:
‎他们迁移贫困人口
‎在当地那些人没有希望和未来

translation.en: and gave them an opportunity.
♪ My clothes may be ragged And my shoes may be worn ♪
♪ But I've been a wealthy boy Since I've been born... ♪
translation.zh: ‎但从我出生起就是个富足的孩子…

translation.en: We were a happy family. We didn't know we were poor.
translation.zh:
‎我们是很幸福的一家人
‎不觉得自己穷… ‎（汤米卡什
‎约翰尼的弟弟/音乐家）

translation.en: We always had plenty to eat and plenty of clothes.
We were happy to be part of the American dream.
translation.zh: ‎我们很开心能成为美国梦的一部分

translation.en: [Joanne] Our family would start the day in the cotton fields,
translation.zh:
‎每天伊始
‎我们一家人会在棉花地里唱歌

translation.en: singing old church hymns and songs that we all knew, we'd sing together.
translation.zh:
‎每天伊始
‎我们一家人会在棉花地里唱歌 ‎老的教会圣歌和大家都会唱的歌
‎我们一起唱

translation.en: Gospel songs or country songs
because it's about our life with the Lord.
translation.zh: ‎因为这是关于我们与主的生活

translation.en: Johnny's grandfather was a hellfire preacher.
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼的爷爷是地狱火传教士

translation.en: He had preacher grandparents on multiple lines of his family tree.
translation.zh: ‎他的家族里面出过很多的传教士

translation.en: They spoke of hell and damnation,
and what it was like if you did not live the right kind of a life.
translation.zh: ‎以及不好好过日子死后的下场

translation.en: John was a dyed-in-the-wool conservative person
translation.zh:
‎约翰是地地道道的保守人士… ‎（杰米斯诺
‎约翰尼的牧师）

translation.en: because his parents were. He was from that part of Arkansas.
translation.zh:
‎…因为他父母就是那样的人
‎他来自阿肯色州的保守地区

translation.en: I don't remember anybody in our family criticizing the government.
translation.zh: ‎我不记得家里有人批评过政府

translation.en: We were patriotic no matter who the president was.
translation.zh: ‎我们是爱国者 不管谁当总统

translation.en: We loved to see the American flag flown.
translation.zh: ‎我们乐于见到美国国旗飘扬

translation.en: My daddy flew it every day until the day he died.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸有生之年每天都升国旗

translation.en: Johnny loved America.
He believed that you should support your government
translation.zh: ‎（卢罗宾 约翰尼的经理） ‎他认为你应该支持政府

translation.en: and support the president.
[Joanne] He was one of the most patriotic men I've ever known.
translation.zh: ‎他是我认识的人里面最爱国的人之一

translation.en: In 1968, the idea of patriotism itself
translation.zh:
‎1968年 爱国主义本身… ‎（比尔齐伯曼
‎反战活动人士/作家）

translation.en: became controversial.
[Nixon] As we look at America, we see cities enveloped in smoke and flames.
translation.zh:
‎我们看到全美多个城市
‎笼罩在烟雾和火光中

translation.en: We hear sirens in the night.
We see Americans dying on distant battlefields abroad.
translation.zh:
‎我们看见美国人
‎在国外遥远的战场上死去

translation.en: We see Americans hating each other, fighting each other,
translation.zh: ‎（焚烧征兵卡） ‎我们看见美国人互相厌恶 互相斗争

translation.en: killing each other at home.
It was a period where
translation.zh:
‎那个时期… ‎（阿拉姆巴克希
‎尼克松演讲稿撰稿人）

translation.en: lots of stuff came to a boil at the same time.
translation.zh:
‎（阿拉姆巴克希
‎尼克松演讲稿撰稿人） ‎…很多事情同时爆发

translation.en: We not only have a right to be free, we have a duty to be free.
translation.zh:
‎（人民享有自由正义吗？） ‎我们不仅有自由的权利
‎还有自由的义务

translation.en: [Bakshian] There were civil rights protests.
There was this unpopular war.
We will prevail in Vietnam over the Communist aggressor!
translation.zh: ‎我们将在越南战胜共产主义侵略者

translation.en: The country split into what has come to be called hawks and doves.
translation.zh: ‎美国分裂成了所谓的鹰派和鸽派

translation.en: Doves wanted to end the war.
Hawks wanted to pursue the war.
-[man] What do you want? -[all] Peace! -[man] When do we get it? -[all] Now!
translation.zh:
‎你们想要什么？和平
‎我们何时得到？现在

translation.en: And these two sides, both Americans,
translation.zh: ‎这两派都是美国人… ‎（结束河内庇护）

translation.en: both claiming to be patriots, went to war with each other.
translation.zh: ‎…都声称自己是爱国者 相互开战

translation.en: [Bakshian] It was the perfect storm,
and Nixon understood that.
And I pledge to you tonight that the first priority
translation.zh:
‎今晚我向你们保证 ‎（共和党全国代表大会
‎1968年8月8日）

translation.en: foreign policy objective of our next administration
translation.zh:
‎（共和党全国代表大会
‎1968年8月8日） ‎下届政府外交目标的首要任务

translation.en: will be to bring an honorable end to the war in Vietnam.
translation.zh: ‎会是光荣地结束在越南的战争

translation.en: Nixon lost the 1960 presidential election to Kennedy,
translation.zh:
‎1960年的总统选举
‎尼克松输给了肯尼迪

translation.en: and he was traumatized by that defeat.
In 1968, he was running for president
in a desperate attempt to resurrect his career.
translation.zh: ‎孤注一掷地想要恢复他的事业

translation.en: The time has come for honest government in the United States of America!
translation.zh: ‎美国廉洁政府的时代已经来临

translation.en: -Thank you! -Thank you, girls.
My father was never afraid to stand up for someone in need.
translation.zh: ‎我父亲从不惧怕 ‎为有困难的人挺身而出

translation.en: And he would always put himself in a position to help those if he could.
translation.zh:
‎（约翰卡特卡什 约翰尼的儿子
‎音乐家/制作人） ‎他总是力所能及地帮助其他人

translation.en: It was that simplicity that was within the heart of the man.
translation.zh: ‎就是他内心深处的那种简单

translation.en: It wasn't the complications of politics.
[Cash] Thank you.
[John Carter] I think that empathy goes back to the loss of his brother.
translation.zh: ‎我认为那种同情心跟他失去哥哥有关

translation.en: ♪ Beside a singin' mountain stream... ♪
Growing up, my father and his brother, Jack, were dearest of friends.
translation.zh:
‎成长过程中 我父亲和他哥哥杰克
‎是最要好的朋友

translation.en: Jack was a man of God at 14 years old.
He studied the Bible all the time.
He knew in his heart that he was going to be a pastor.
They were so inseparable.
♪ But flesh and blood Needs flesh and blood ♪
♪ And you are what I need ♪
On Saturdays, Johnny, Jack, and my other brothers,
translation.zh:
‎每个周六 约翰尼
‎杰克和我的其他兄弟

translation.en: all of us, would do odd jobs to help Mama with the groceries.
translation.zh:
‎我们所有人都会打零工
‎帮妈妈买杂货

translation.en: In May of 1944, Jack was sawing some fence post.
translation.zh: ‎1944年5月 杰克在锯一些栅栏

translation.en: As he was pushing the fence post into the saw,
it jerked... and jerked him into the saw.
It was beyond horrible.
I remember Johnny crying and holding his hand,
translation.zh: ‎我记得约翰尼哭着拉着他的手

translation.en: saying, "Somebody do something!"
It was as bad as you can imagine.
The next day after the funeral,
we were all back in the cotton fields, working.
I can't even describe the emptiness and the hurt.
translation.zh: ‎我无法形容那种空虚和伤痛

translation.en: [Stielper] Ray and Carrie,
Johnny's mother and father, and 12-year-old Johnny
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼的父母和12岁的约翰尼

translation.en: are the ones that had to shoulder that burden.
It was back-breaking.
They were working every day and not getting anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎他们每天工作 但依然一贫如洗

translation.en: Ray Cash, who had thought Dyess was his promised land,
translation.zh: ‎雷卡什觉得戴斯是他的应许之地

translation.en: found that it wasn't.
Jack was going to be a preacher.
He was going to be the son of Dyess that made it.
translation.zh: ‎他原本会是成功的戴斯之子

translation.en: Johnny was a very sensitive young man.
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼是非常敏感的年轻人

translation.en: There was not room for sensitivity.
There was not room for dreamers in Dyess, Arkansas in the 1940s.
translation.zh:
‎20世纪40年代的阿肯色州
‎戴斯容不下梦想者

translation.en: Ray became so bitter, he resented his son.
translation.zh: ‎雷变得苦大仇深 他讨厌自己的儿子

translation.en: He would look at Johnny and he would say, "You weren't the right son.
translation.zh:
‎他会看着约翰尼说
‎“你不是我要的儿子

translation.en: You should've died."
Johnny Cash grew up feeling unworthy of being himself.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什成长过程中
‎觉得自己是没用的人

translation.en: He felt that he would never measure up
to what his father wanted him to be.
Something happened within my dad,
and there was this deep wound that was placed there,
this hollow well.
There was also a drive that was installed,
and all these different faces that were Johnny Cash were developed
translation.zh:
‎因为童年的失去亲人的痛苦
‎让约翰尼卡什发展出了

translation.en: through that great loss at an early age.
A prison's a prison.
And that's all it is.
[June] I'm sure you'll enjoy him this afternoon.
translation.zh: ‎我确定今天下午你们会喜欢他的表演

translation.en: He seems to have a lot of things in common with you, Mr. Johnny Cash!
translation.zh:
‎他好像有很多事要和你们聊
‎约翰尼卡什先生

translation.en: [John Carter] My father knew what it was like to suffer.
He knew what it was like to feel lost.
And so, he could connect with other people's suffering.
translation.zh: ‎所以他能感同身受别人的痛苦

translation.en: He sang for those who needed something to believe in and needed to be lifted up.
translation.zh: ‎他为那些需要信仰和振作的人歌唱

translation.en: [Stielper] In January of 1968,
Johnny Cash went to Folsom Prison and performed for the inmates.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什来到福尔瑟姆监狱
‎为囚犯们表演

translation.en: ♪ I hear the train a comin' It's rollin' 'round the bend ♪
translation.zh: ‎我听见火车来 它在拐弯处

translation.en: ♪ And I ain't seen the sunshine Since I don't know when ♪
translation.zh:
‎我没见过阳光
‎因为我不知道什么时候

translation.en: ♪ I'm stuck in Folsom Prison And time keeps draggin' on ♪
translation.zh:
‎自己被困在了
‎福尔瑟姆监狱 时光流逝

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Yeah!
[Stielper] He looked on some of those guys in there,
looked on the desperation in their eyes,
and he thought, "There but for the grace of God goes me.
I made some stumbles in my life.
That could've been me."
♪ But I shot a man in Reno Just to watch him die... ♪
translation.zh:
‎但我在雷诺射杀了一个人
‎眼睁睁看他死去…

translation.en: He brought recording equipment because he wanted people to hear
translation.zh:
‎他带去了录音设备
‎因为他想大家去听

translation.en: the rawness of what it was like to perform for these men.
translation.zh: ‎为这些人表演的这种原汁原味

translation.en: John always related to prisoners,
amongst others that had drug troubles.
My father was full of love.
He was full of faith. He worked hard.
He was self-made.
But he was also a man who hit hard rock bottom quite a few times.
translation.zh: ‎但他也是很多次跌到低谷的人

translation.en: Whether it's alcohol, drugs, whatever it is that changes your personality,
translation.zh:
‎（唐里德 史泰特勒兄弟合唱团
‎与卡什一起巡演） ‎不管酒精还是毒品
‎都会改变你的个性

translation.en: your demeanor, your physical look, and he went through all of this.
translation.zh: ‎你的举止、你的外表 他都经历过

translation.en: [John Carter] He could be a liar.
He struggled. He made mistakes.
He was a different man when he was in that mode.
translation.zh: ‎他在那种状态下就变了一个人

translation.en: My father had never been an inmate,
but they accepted him as one of their own.
He was a champion of the underdog and the downtrodden.
translation.zh: ‎他是弱者和受压迫者的捍卫者

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you have political leanings?
No, not all that much.
If somebody says,
"I'm not my brother's keeper," he's wrong 'cause he is.
translation.zh:
‎“我不是我兄弟的守护者”
‎他错了 因为他是

translation.en: He is his brother's keeper.
[Stielper] In May 1968, Johnny Cash At Folsom Prison is released.
translation.zh:
‎（福尔瑟姆监狱现场录音
‎约翰尼卡什《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》） ‎1968年5月 约翰尼卡什的
‎《福尔瑟姆监狱》专辑发行

translation.en: "Folsom Prison Blues" gets to number one.
translation.zh:
‎《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》
‎登上排行榜首位

translation.en: He is viewed as Johnny Cash, this rebel.
And that appealed to a broad audience.
[John Carter] People responded to that rebel identity,
but what was amazing is they'd think they knew him,
translation.zh: ‎但厉害的是他们觉得了解他

translation.en: and then he'd change.
The Album of the Year, Johnny Cash, At Folsom Prison!
translation.zh:
‎年度最佳专辑 约翰尼卡什的
‎《福尔瑟姆监狱蓝调》

translation.en: He had a lot of songs that he would cut as a country song,
translation.zh: ‎他有很多歌曲被录制成乡村音乐

translation.en: and it would spill over into the pop charts.
I think that was why he was so successful.
translation.zh: ‎我想那是他如此成功的原因

translation.en: There was no limit to who wanted to listen to Johnny Cash.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什的歌迷
‎并不局限于某个群体

translation.en: [Stielper] By the late '60s, Johnny's star rises,
translation.zh:
‎到20世纪60年代末
‎约翰尼声名鹊起

translation.en: as does Mr. Nixon's.
He wins the presidency in 1968.
Having lost a close one eight years ago and having won a close one this year,
I can say this... winning's a lot more fun!
translation.zh: ‎我可以这么说：胜选更有意思！

translation.en: But we won narrowly, we won with 43% of the vote.
translation.zh: ‎但我们是险胜 赢得43%的选票 ‎（巴特布坎南 尼克松的资深顾问）

translation.en: I, Richard Milhous Nixon, do solemnly swear...
translation.zh:
‎我 理查德米尔豪斯尼克松
‎郑重宣誓…

translation.en: That you will faithfully execute the office...
That I will faithfully...
The Southern strategy that Nixon used to win the 1968 presidential election
translation.zh:
‎尼克松使用南方策略
‎赢得1968年总统大选

translation.en: has been used by every Republican presidential candidate since.
translation.zh:
‎此策略此后被每位共和党
‎总统候选人使用

translation.en: The Southern strategy sends out dog whistles to racists
translation.zh: ‎南方策略对种族主义者发出狗哨

translation.en: and dog whistles to conservatives,
translation.zh: ‎（烧越共比烧国旗好） ‎对保守主义者发出狗哨

translation.en: using key phrases like "the silent majority."
translation.zh: ‎使用关键词组 比如“沉默的大多数”

translation.en: The Southern strategy basically was to hold the South,
translation.zh: ‎南方策略基本上是稳住南方

translation.en: bringing those people into the Nixon Coalition.
The essence was traditional conservatives and law and order,
translation.zh:
‎其本质是传统的保守主义
‎以及法律和秩序

translation.en: supporting Americans in Vietnam,
standing up against the demonstrators who were against the war,
translation.zh: ‎…站出来反对那些反战的示威者

translation.en: and basically representing the values and beliefs of Middle America
translation.zh: ‎基本上代表中产阶级的价值观和信仰

translation.en: against the rising social and cultural revolution in the country.
translation.zh: ‎反对国内兴起的社会和文化革命

translation.en: The peace of the world will depend not just on America's military might,
translation.zh: ‎世界和平不仅依赖于美国的军事实力

translation.en: which is the greatest in the world,
translation.zh: ‎我们有世界上最强大的军队

translation.en: but it's going to depend on our character,
our love of our country,
our willingness to not only wear the flag but stand up for the flag,
translation.zh:
‎我们愿意佩戴国旗
‎并且愿意为国旗挺身而出

translation.en: and country music does that.
[Buchanan] Throughout Nixon's entire presidency,
translation.zh: ‎贯穿尼克松的整个总统任期

translation.en: well, even into his second term,
he attempted to cultivate the support of the South.
[all] ♪ God bless America ♪
♪ My home sweet home ♪
Hello, I'm Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: ‎大家好 我是约翰尼卡什

translation.en: [Stielper] In 1969, The Johnny Cash Show first aired on national TV.
translation.zh:
‎1969年 约翰尼卡什秀
‎在全国电视上首播

translation.en: Oh, hi, there!
It was a variety entertainment show,
and it was unlike anything anyone had ever seen.
Certainly unlike anything that anybody had ever seen in country music.
translation.zh:
‎当然也不像人们
‎之前看过的乡村音乐表演

translation.en: ♪ He healed the leper and the lame... ♪
[Stielper] He sings gospel songs.
Make welcome my brother, Tommy Cash.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎我的弟弟 汤米卡什

translation.en: Hey, Tommy! Welcome!
♪ He'd say do what you do, do well, boy! Do what you do, do well! ♪
translation.zh:
‎（汤米卡什
‎约翰尼的弟弟/音乐家） ‎他说做你擅长的 孩子 做你擅长的

translation.en: [Stielper] It was a family affair all around.
♪ You say you're lookin' for someone Who's never weak ♪
translation.zh:
‎你说你在找一个永不软弱的人 ‎（琼卡特卡什
‎约翰尼的妻子/音乐家）

translation.en: ♪ But always strong... ♪
He puts on a special segment on every show called "Ride This Train."
translation.zh:
‎他在每场秀中都有一个特别单元
‎叫做“赶上这班火车”

translation.en: Ride this train with me to San Antonio, Texas;
translation.zh: ‎赶上这班火车在德州圣安东尼奥

translation.en: Springfield, Missouri; Boise, Idaho.
translation.zh: ‎密苏里春田和爱荷达州波夕制作

translation.en: It's a quintessentially American experience.
And he puts people on TV that nobody's ever seen before,
translation.zh:
‎他请来的人观众之前
‎从未在电视上见过

translation.en: but it's not just country people.
Please make welcome Ms. Joni Mitchell.
♪ Rows and flows of angel hair... ♪
[Stielper] Bob Dylan...
♪ Love is all there is It makes the world go 'round... ♪
translation.zh: ‎爱无处无在 让世界转动起来…

translation.en: He puts on Pete Seeger.
-That's nice. [chuckles] -[applause]
[Stielper] These were all leaders of the anti-war movement.
The people that I'm contracted with said that,
"How dare you, supposedly such a good American,
have a Communist like Pete Seeger on your TV show?"
translation.zh:
‎邀请皮特西格
‎这样的共党分子上节目？”

translation.en: The Pete Seeger I know
and the Pete Seeger that June and I have come to love is,
I'd say, one of the best Americans and patriots I've ever known.
translation.zh:
‎我要说 是我认识的最好的美国人
‎和爱国者之一

translation.en: But Pete Seeger is not coming on there
and singing "Where Have All the Flowers Gone?"
This is a non-political venue.
[John Carter] My father did not adhere to any certain party.
A Republican would claim him and also a Democrat would,
translation.zh: ‎民主和共和两党都称他是本党党员

translation.en: and my father wouldn't argue either point.
♪ I keep my eyes wide open all the time ♪
John walked a political line.
♪ I walk the line ♪
Yes, he tried. He tried to walk the line.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他试过 他试过走政治路线

translation.en: People will say, "Oh, he tried to have it both ways."
translation.zh: ‎人们会说：“哦 他想脚踏两只船”

translation.en: ♪ Because you're mine I walk the line... ♪
translation.zh: ‎因为你是我的 我要勇往直前

translation.en: This was in the midst of tremendous social turmoil.
translation.zh: ‎当时正处于 ‎巨大的社会动荡中

translation.en: Johnny Cash doesn't get involved in that. He is not political.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什没有参与其中
‎他对政治没有兴趣

translation.en: He does not take a stand.
I thank you very much.
While you could be neutral in the middle of those polarities,
translation.zh: ‎在那种对立 文化和政治氛围中

translation.en: culturally and politically, it was difficult.
And the more time went by, the harder it was to be neutral.
translation.zh: ‎随着时间推移 保持中立就更难

translation.en: [chanting] Peace over war! Peace over war!
Peace over war! Peace over war!
[Buchanan] In the Fall of '69,
a huge demonstration was planned
to bring out hundreds of thousands of people
to break the Nixon presidency on Vietnam.
translation.zh: ‎破坏尼克松总统的越南政策

translation.en: We have been too often disappointed by the optimism of the American leaders,
translation.zh:
‎我们常常对美国领导人的
‎乐观情绪感到失望

translation.en: both in Vietnam and Washington,
to have faith any longer...
When parts of the news media projected the failures of US policy,
translation.zh:
‎当部分新闻媒体预测到
‎美国政策失败时

translation.en: it began to create a gap
between what the government was telling us and what the news media started to report.
translation.zh: ‎政府的说法和新闻媒体的报道不一样

translation.en: In the midst of this war, we began to understand
translation.zh: ‎在这场战争中 我们开始明白

translation.en: that we were being lied to,
and that further polarized society.
[Nixon] The radical fuel that you see on your television screens night after night,
translation.zh: ‎你每晚在电视上看到的激进煽动

translation.en: they're not a majority of American youth today
translation.zh: ‎他们不代表当今大多数的美国青年… ‎（支持弹劾）

translation.en: and they will not be the leaders of America tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎…他们也不会成为美国未来的领袖

translation.en: Nixon was paranoid about these antiwar protesters,
translation.zh:
‎尼克松感到疑惑… ‎（亚历山大巴特菲尔德
‎尼克松的副幕僚长） ‎…这些反战人士大部分是年轻人

translation.en: most of whom were young.
translation.zh: ‎…这些反战人士大部分是年轻人

translation.en: [crowd] One, two, three, four, Tricky Dick passed a law!
translation.zh:
‎一、二、三、四
‎狡猾的迪克通过一项法律 ‎（尼克松扼杀儿童）

translation.en: He used to say to me sometimes, "What is it with these young people?
translation.zh:
‎他有时候会问我
‎“这些年轻人怎么了？

translation.en: What don't they understand?"
We felt that we were being patriotic.
translation.zh: ‎我们觉得… ‎（马上撤军停战） ‎…我们是爱国的

translation.en: He wanted them to look shameful.
We're in the middle of a revolution.
So, I told the president, "If we don't stand up here,
translation.zh:
‎所以我告诉总统
‎“如果我们不站稳脚跟

translation.en: your presidency is going to be broken."
Tonight I want to talk to you on a subject of deep concern to all Americans,
translation.zh:
‎（1969年11月3日） ‎今晚我要谈论全美人民
‎都深刻关切的问题

translation.en: the war in Vietnam.
The American people are entitled to know the truth...
translation.zh: ‎美国人民有权知道真相… ‎（尼克松危机）

translation.en: but as President of the United States,
I would be untrue to my oath of office
if I allowed the policy of this nation
to be dictated by the minority mounting demonstrations in the street.
North Vietnam cannot defeat or humiliate the United States.
Only Americans can do that.
And so tonight, to you,
the great Silent Majority
of my fellow Americans,
I ask for your support.
I have initiated a plan which will end this war
translation.zh:
‎我已经启动了一项计划
‎旨在结束战争

translation.en: in a way that will bring us closer to that great goal:
translation.zh: ‎能让我们离那个伟大的目标更近

translation.en: the goal of a just and lasting peace.
Johnny Cash was, like most Southerners,
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼卡什跟大多数南方人一样

translation.en: supportive of the president's position and strategy in ending the war.
translation.zh: ‎支持总统结束战争的立场和策略

translation.en: From his TV show, he gets up there and he says...
My family here and I stand behind the President of the United States
in his quest for a just and lasting peace.
He's surrounded by a crew and by producers
translation.zh: ‎他身边的工作人员和制作人

translation.en: who are from California, who are from New York,
translation.zh: ‎他们来自加州 来自纽约

translation.en: who do not believe what they are hearing.
translation.zh: ‎他们不敢相信自己听到的话

translation.en: "What did you just do?
You have just alienated half of your audience.
This is outrageous!"
Johnny Cash said, "You put that in or I do not come back to work."
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼说： “你们不播
‎我就不回来主持”

translation.en: They put it in.
Johnny's message that goes out across the airwaves
gets to the White House,
and the president writes a letter.
"Dear Mr. Cash,
Pat and I were so appreciative of what you said about us.
translation.zh: ‎帕特和我都很感激你说的那番话

translation.en: We want to find an honorable end to the war.
Thank you for your support. Richard Nixon."
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你的支持 理查德尼克松”

translation.en: Johnny Cash had been
one of my favorites since the mid-1950s.
And so I started pushing, and others did,
translation.zh: ‎所以我开始推动 其他人也说

translation.en: "Let's being Johnny Cash to the White House!"
translation.zh: ‎“我们把约翰尼卡什请到白宫来”

translation.en: [Joanne] One day, I was at work at the House of Cash
and we got a phone call from the White House.
translation.zh:
‎（乔安妮卡什
‎约翰尼的妹妹/音乐家） ‎…我们接到了白宫打来的电话

translation.en: And it was President Nixon.
We were sayin', "What? What?"
He had invited John and June and the Cash family
to come visit the White House, and for Johnny to sing
translation.zh:
‎参观白宫 约翰尼还要献唱… ‎（白宫晚宴
‎1970年4月17日 周五）

translation.en: and do a concert there.
Having Johnny Cash at the White House
symbolizes the kind of base that Richard Nixon was trying to appeal to,
translation.zh:
‎（阿拉姆巴克希
‎尼克松演讲稿撰稿人） ‎…象征着理查德尼克松
‎想要吸引的民众类型

translation.en: which wasn't a traditional Republican base:
blue collar Americans that did go for Nixon in millions,
translation.zh: ‎数百万支持尼克松的美国蓝领… ‎（我们以尼克松为荣）

translation.en: and who liked Johnny Cash's music.
[Buchanan] Nixon liked classical music, but we persuaded him
translation.zh: ‎尼克松喜欢古典音乐 但我们说服他

translation.en: that this would be a great evening.
Also, culturally and socially,
translation.zh: ‎（巴特布坎南 尼克松的资深顾问） ‎…同样在文化和社会方面

translation.en: Johnny Cash represented Nashville, he represented country and western.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什代表纳什维尔
‎他代表乡村和西部

translation.en: This is culturally us.
We had someone mainstream who had not been at Woodstock.
translation.zh:
‎我们请来没参加过
‎伍德斯托克音乐节的主流歌手

translation.en: He and June are over-the-top.
June goes out and gets herself a custom-made dress,
gorgeous, still in a museum.
translation.zh: ‎非常美 依然收藏在博物馆里

translation.en: Everybody wants to be on the guest list.
translation.zh: ‎大家都想出现在宾客名单上

translation.en: There's only 250 people that can get into the East Room,
and the White House had never seen anything like it.
They got requests from literally everywhere
translation.zh: ‎他们真的是收到全国各地的请求

translation.en: to get a ticket to this moment.
Anybody who wasn't Johnny Cash's friend suddenly became his friend,
translation.zh:
‎不是约翰尼卡什朋友的人
‎突然成了他的朋友

translation.en: and his friends became his best friends.
translation.zh: ‎他的朋友成了他最好的朋友

translation.en: President Nixon requested that my father perform "Okie from Muskogee"...
translation.zh:
‎尼克松总统要求我父亲
‎表演《来自穆斯科基的雇农》

translation.en: ♪ And I'm proud to be An Okie from Muskogee ♪
translation.zh:
‎我以身为一个来自
‎穆斯科基的俄克拉荷马人为荣

translation.en: ...which Merle Haggard had recorded that was a big country hit.
translation.zh:
‎梅尔哈格德创作的歌曲
‎当时很热门的乡村歌曲 ‎（约翰卡特卡什 约翰尼的儿子）

translation.en: ♪ We don't smoke marijuana In Muskogee ♪
♪ We don't burn our draft cards Down on Main Street... ♪
[Buchanan] It was about the values of somebody in Muskogee, Oklahoma,
translation.zh:
‎歌曲是关于俄克拉荷马
‎穆斯科基人的价值观

translation.en: and how their way of life differed utterly
from the counter-culture hippies from San Francisco.
translation.zh: ‎和旧金山的反文化嬉皮士完全不同

translation.en: [Stielper] The other was "Welfare Cadillac."
It was a very mean-spirited song that made fun of people who were on welfare.
translation.zh:
‎这是一首尖酸刻薄的歌曲
‎取笑那些领福利的人

translation.en: ♪ Well, I've never worked much ♪
♪ In fact, I've been poor all my life ♪
♪ I guess about all I really own Is ten kids and a wife ♪
translation.zh: ‎我猜我只有十个孩子和一位妻子

translation.en: ♪ Of course This house that I live in is mine ♪ ♪ But it's really a shack ♪
translation.zh:
‎我希望我住的这个房子是我的
‎但它真的只是个棚屋

translation.en: ♪ But I always managed To drive me a brand new Cadillac! ♪
translation.zh:
‎但我一直想办法
‎开一辆崭新的凯迪拉克

translation.en: [Stielper] When a press release went out from the White House staff
translation.zh: ‎（白宫办公厅主任致尼克松夫人） ‎当白宫新闻稿发布

translation.en: that announced that President Nixon had requested that John sing those songs,
translation.zh: ‎宣称尼克松总统要求约翰唱这些歌

translation.en: immediately there was this brouhaha in the media.
Country singer Johnny Cash is booked for a White House appearance April 17th.
translation.zh:
‎乡村歌手约翰尼卡什
‎预定出席4月17日的白宫晚宴

translation.en: The performance already is stirring some protest though.
Not about the singer, but about a song.
translation.zh: ‎不是抗议歌手 而是一首歌

translation.en: [Dan Rather] The name of the song is on jukeboxes all over the country, "Welfare Cadillac,"
translation.zh:
‎全国的点唱机上都能找到这首歌
‎《福利凯迪拉克》

translation.en: a man who drives to pick up his welfare checks in a big automobile.
translation.zh: ‎一个男人开着一辆大车去领救济金

translation.en: [Stielper] It was on the CBS News.
It was in Time magazine, in newspapers.
"Nixon wants Cash to sing these songs."
translation.zh: ‎（《尼克松的数字》） ‎尼克松希望卡什唱这些歌

translation.en: Well, now there are some protests from welfare and civil rights leaders.
translation.zh: ‎福利和民权领袖有抗议的声音

translation.en: One says, "A song like that distorts the facts about welfare
translation.zh:
‎有人说：“这种歌曲扭曲
‎社会福利的事实

translation.en: and further irritates those who pay their taxes."
How could the president ask for this song that put down citizens of this country?
translation.zh: ‎总统怎么会点这首贬低国民的歌？

translation.en: A White House spokesman said the president didn't know whether
translation.zh: ‎一位白宫发言人称总统不知道

translation.en: Johnny Cash would sing it or not.
[Stielper] The response from the Cash side was
"Johnny's learning them now."
Johnny Cash says he will sing it at the White House
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼卡什说他会在白宫唱

translation.en: if that's what the president wants. The White House says,
the president wants it.
[Stielper] The president has asked John to come and sing
for this great cultural moment.
This is as great a stage as you could possibly imagine.
translation.zh: ‎这是你能想到的最好的舞台

translation.en: The politicians in the White House had another agenda, though.
They wanted to use Johnny Cash as part of their Southern strategy,
translation.zh:
‎他们想利用约翰卡什
‎作为他们南方策略的一部分

translation.en: especially as it related to the upcoming Senate election in Tennessee.
translation.zh:
‎特别是想将其与马上进行的
‎田纳西州参议员选举联系起来

translation.en: [Bakshian] Almost since the Civil War,
Tennessee was a Democratic state,
translation.zh:
‎田纳西州一直是民主党的天下… ‎（共和党 巴里戈德沃特
‎民主党 林登约翰逊）

translation.en: but with the Southern strategy,
the new Republican party is being born in the South.
translation.zh: ‎新共和党在南方出现 ‎（独立党 乔治华莱士）

translation.en: The old Democratic party is dying.
I am target number one of the Southern strategy.
translation.zh:
‎我是南方策略的头号目标 ‎（阿尔戈尔二世参议员
‎田纳西州 民主党）

translation.en: And President Nixon anointed in the White House
his chosen instrument of the Southern strategy,
Congressman Brock of Chattanooga.
translation.zh: ‎查塔努加的布洛克议员 ‎（比尔布洛克 竞选美国参议员）

translation.en: Well, I appreciate your help my friend, very much.
translation.zh: ‎感谢你的帮助 非常感谢

translation.en: Good to see you.
[Bakshian] And Bill Brock is one of the key people in the vanguard on the Southern strategy.
translation.zh:
‎比尔布洛克
‎是南方策略的先锋人物之一

translation.en: And William Brock III, whose conservative record has been unsullied
in eight years in the House of Representatives.
[Bakshian] Bill Brock was being opposed by Tex Ritter
translation.zh: ‎比尔布洛克要和泰克斯立特

translation.en: for the Republican Senate nominee in Tennessee.
translation.zh: ‎争夺田纳西的共和党参议员提名

translation.en: -Hello there! -Hello.
-Tex Ritter. -Good evening.
[Bakshian] Tex Ritter was an old Country Western singer.
translation.zh:
‎泰克斯立特曾经
‎是一位西部乡村乐歌手

translation.en: [Buchanan] Cash was a great friend of Tex Ritter's.
translation.zh: ‎卡什是泰克斯立特的好朋友

translation.en: There was a memo written by a guy named Murray Chotiner
translation.zh:
‎一位叫默里乔蒂纳的人
‎写过一份简报

translation.en: roughly a month prior to Johnny Cash appearing at the White House.
translation.zh: ‎大概就在卡什造访白宫前一个月

translation.en: It said, "To Bob Haldeman, From Murray Chotiner:
translation.zh:
‎简报写道 “默里乔蒂纳
‎写给鲍勃霍尔德曼

translation.en: Johnny Cash is great with a certain block of voters in Tennessee.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼卡什和
‎田纳西州选民的关系很好

translation.en: Obviously, he will not say or do anything against Tex Ritter,
translation.zh:
‎明显他不会说或者做任何
‎对泰克斯立特不利的事

translation.en: who is running for the US Senate against Congressman Bill Brock
translation.zh:
‎泰克斯正在竞选美国参议员
‎他要和比尔布洛克议员竞争

translation.en: for the GOP nomination.
At the Johnny Cash evening at the White House, it'll be most helpful
translation.zh:
‎在约翰尼卡什的白宫之夜
‎最有帮助的是

translation.en: if privately the president can neutralize Johnny Cash
translation.zh: ‎如果总统私下能说服卡什保持中立

translation.en: so he does not campaign for Tex Ritter."
translation.zh: ‎那么他就不会为泰克斯立特助选”

translation.en: Nixon was thematically appealing to the Silent Majority,
translation.zh: ‎尼克松一直用话题吸引沉默的大多数

translation.en: but more than wanting to take advantage of Johnny Cash,
Richard Nixon really identified with him.
translation.zh: ‎理查德尼克松真的很认同卡什

translation.en: And he thought they were kindred souls
because they both had had really tough upbringings
translation.zh: ‎因为他们两人的童年都很辛苦

translation.en: and everything they got and everything they achieved
translation.zh: ‎他们得到的一切 完成的一切

translation.en: they had earned for themselves against tight odds.
translation.zh: ‎都是靠自己打拼艰难得来的

translation.en: Well, Nixon was raised by a sometimes abusive father.
translation.zh:
‎尼克松成长过程中
‎有时会被父亲虐待

translation.en: You know, out there on a struggling lemon farm in California.
translation.zh: ‎在加州一个勉强维持的柠檬农场里

translation.en: Two of his brothers died of tuberculosis.
And he grew up poor, poor as hell.
And because of these parallels,
you know, Nixon, he thought he understood Johnny Cash.
translation.zh: ‎尼克松觉得自己理解约翰尼卡什

translation.en: He felt that he knew what kind of person Cash was.

‎尼克松的副幕僚长）

translation.en: ♪ Young man sitting On the witness stand ♪
♪ Man with a book says ♪
translation.zh:
‎拿着《圣经》的人说
‎“举起你的手 跟我说

translation.en: ♪ "Raise your hand, repeat after me I solemnly swear" ♪
translation.zh:
‎拿着《圣经》的人说
‎“举起你的手 跟我说 ‎我庄严发誓…”

translation.en: ♪ Judge looked down at his long hair ♪
♪ And although the young man Solemnly swore ♪
translation.zh: ‎虽然这位年轻人已经庄严宣誓

translation.en: ♪ Nobody seemed to hear anymore ♪
♪ And it didn't really matter If the truth was there ♪
♪ It was the cut of his clothes And the length of his hair ♪
translation.zh: ‎这是他衣服的剪裁和头发的长度

translation.en: ♪ And the lonely voice of youth cries ♪
♪ "What is truth?" ♪
♪ Young girl dancing to the latest beat ♪
♪ Found new ways to move her feet ♪
♪ Young man speaking in the city square ♪
♪ Trying to tell somebody that he cares ♪
♪ Yeah, the ones That you're callin' wild ♪
translation.zh: ‎对 那些你们成为疯子的人

translation.en: ♪ Gonna be the leaders In a little while ♪
♪ This old world's waking To a newborn day ♪
♪ And I solemnly swear That it'll be their way ♪
translation.zh: ‎我庄严发誓 这就是他们的方式

translation.en: ♪ We better help that Voice of youth find ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们最好帮助那个年轻的声音找到

translation.en: ♪ "What is truth?" ♪
♪ And the lonely voice of youth cries "What is truth?" ♪
translation.zh:
‎年轻的孤独声音在呼喊
‎“什么是真相？”

translation.en: Johnny had a way to say something in a song
to get a point across,
and he did it well.
The most powerful man in the United States at that time,
translation.zh: ‎那个时候美国最有权力的人

translation.en: I think it got to him.
He understood the message.
[John Carter] My father wasn't afraid to say what he thought,
translation.zh: ‎我父亲不怕说出自己的想法

translation.en: which was, "I hope to bring peace. But I'm not afraid to get dirty.
translation.zh:
‎就是 “我希望带来和平
‎但我不怕弄脏双手

translation.en: And I'm not afraid to fight for what I believe in.
And I'm not afraid to go where I'm uncomfortable
translation.zh: ‎我不怕去让我不舒服的地方

translation.en: to stand up for love.
I'm a dove with claws."
[Stielper] Johnny Cash was putting himself front-and-center.
He had gone out on a limb there.
This song was delivering a message
that the current leaders who were looking on young people
translation.zh: ‎目前的领导人 他们旁观青少年

translation.en: and marginalizing them need to understand that
translation.zh: ‎排斥年轻人 这些领导人需要明白

translation.en: this is the future,
and we need to honor and respect that.
Mr. Nixon, whose personal taste in music runs more to tunes from South Pacific,
translation.zh:
‎尼克松先生的个人音乐品味
‎比较偏向于南太平洋音乐

translation.en: threw himself into the foot-tapping spirit of Cash's twanging guitar,
translation.zh: ‎让自己沉浸在卡什轻快的吉他声中

translation.en: and when it was over, heaped praise on the entire troupe.
translation.zh: ‎表演结束后给予整个乐队热烈掌声

translation.en: The closest Cash came to a song with obvious political overtones
translation.zh: ‎卡什最具政治色彩的一首歌曲

translation.en: has a theme not from the '30s,
but from now,
and the thrust of it seemed to surprise the president a bit.
translation.zh: ‎这一举动似乎让总统有点意外

translation.en: Johnny Cash, you've played country fairs,
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼卡什 你在乡村音乐节

translation.en: Grand Ole Oprys and before prison audiences.
translation.zh: ‎大奥普里剧院和监狱观众面前表演过

translation.en: Was it any different tonight,
playing before the President of the United States and at the White House?
translation.zh: ‎在白宫总统尼克松面前表演？

translation.en: Well, in several ways, it was, Dan.
It was quite different, uh...
We were playing for some very important people tonight, of course.
translation.zh:
‎当然今晚我们为一些
‎很重要的人士表演

translation.en: I tried to keep the performance honest.
Good or bad,
it was honest, I think.
My dad would never, in his life, disrespect the office of the presidency.
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸一辈子绝对不会
‎对总统办公室无礼

translation.en: It was part of his patriotism.
He had a history of being bold.
But his performance at the White House was a turning point.
translation.zh: ‎但他在白宫的表演是转折点

translation.en: [Snow] Evidently, John knew something or picked up on something
translation.zh:
‎显然约翰知道一些事
‎或者注意到一些事

translation.en: and I think he was trying to say,
powerfully, to President Nixon,
"You need to think about what you're doing.
translation.zh: ‎“你需要考虑一下自己的所作所为

translation.en: And you need to be truthful."
Who would have ever thought that that song would have been so prophetic?
translation.zh: ‎谁会想到那首歌会一语成谶？

translation.en: I have concluded that the time has come for action.
translation.zh: ‎（1970年4月30日） ‎我决定现在应该采取行动

translation.en: Attacks are being launched this week to clean out major enemy sanctuaries
translation.zh:
‎这星期发动的攻势要清除
‎柬埔寨和越南边界的

translation.en: on the Cambodian/Vietnam border.
Shortly after the Johnny Cash event,
Nixon announced the Cambodian Incursion.
translation.zh: ‎尼克松宣布入侵柬埔寨 ‎（柬埔寨 南越）

translation.en: The speech basically said that Americans are going to be fighting in Cambodia.
translation.zh:
‎那次演说基本上是称
‎美国人将在柬埔寨作战

translation.en: Cambodia was a neutral country.
Nixon had been bombing it secretly, without Congressional approval,
translation.zh:
‎尼克松在未得到国会授权
‎在美国人不知情的情况下

translation.en: and without the knowledge of the American people.
[Stielper] It galvanized those who said, "Well, wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎（阻止尼克松滥杀无辜） ‎此举刺激了那些说：“等等

translation.en: We're supposed to be getting out of Vietnam.
Now, we're expanding the war."
[Snow] We all thought he was doing one thing,
and they were actually doing another.
Nixon lied not only to America
but to our soldiers.
translation.zh: ‎（越南退伍军人和平组织） ‎还欺骗了美军士兵

translation.en: The country went into flames.
[Buchanan] At Kent State University, there had been riots.
translation.zh:
‎（肯特州立大学
‎1970年5月4日） ‎肯特州立大学发生暴乱

translation.en: National Guard troops were on the campuses.
Instantly, there were four dead and nine wounded.
translation.zh: ‎马上造成四人死亡 九人受伤

translation.en: [Stielper] Kent State happened two weeks after the White House performance.
translation.zh:
‎肯特州立大学事件
‎发生于白宫表演两周后

translation.en: For all of his support for the president and for the government,
translation.zh: ‎他原本全力支持总统和政府

translation.en: Johnny Cash was blindsided.
John didn't like the idea of being used.
[Cash] Those young people out there seem to be
trying to hold on to that part of our American heritage
that they believe was good and beautiful.
All they desire is to be listened to.
They're only exercising their freedom of speech
and God help you if that's ever taken away from them, America.
translation.zh:
‎要是美国人没有言论自由
‎上帝保佑你们

translation.en: John starts thinking much harder about the totality of what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎约翰开始认真思考当前局势

translation.en: He sang "Blowin' in the Wind" on his television show.
translation.zh: ‎他在电视节目中演出《随风飘摇》

translation.en: ♪ How many times Must the cannonballs fly ♪
translation.zh: ‎炮弹要飞多久 ‎（1970年退伍军人节）

translation.en: ♪ Before they're forever banned? ♪
"Blowin' in the Wind" was a whistle.
The quintessential anti-war anthem.
♪ The answer is blowin' in the wind ♪
The people in the audience,
half of them sat on their hands.
The other half burst into a standing ovation.
That was America.
Johnny Cash was America.
[reporter] Five men arrested early Saturday,
who were charged with breaking into the party's national headquarters
translation.zh: ‎（华盛顿特区 1972年6月17日） ‎他们被指控闯入党在华盛顿

translation.en: at the Watergate in Washington.
[Fred Thompson] Mr. Butterfield, are you aware of the installation of any listening devices
translation.zh: ‎巴特菲尔德先生 你知道总统办公室

translation.en: in the Oval Office of the President?
I was aware of listening devices. Yes, sir.
[Butterfield] I'm from a military family.
Lying was just considered-- We just didn't do it.
translation.zh: ‎说谎被认为是…我们就是不会说谎

translation.en: [Stielper] In August 1974, the president resigned
in the face of almost certain impeachment.
translation.zh: ‎几乎确定的弹劾 选择辞职

translation.en: John attended the trial of HR Haldeman
translation.zh: ‎约翰出席对HR霍尔德曼的审判

translation.en: amid the trials associated with the Watergate break-ins.
You guys have to get up awfully early, don't you?
Watergate was personal to him because of what it represented,
translation.zh:
‎水门事件对他来说有私人意义
‎因为它代表了

translation.en: of what Johnny Cash was always seeing as the nobility
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼卡什一直被美国人民视为

translation.en: of the American people.
And when our leaders let us down,
he felt it very personally.
So, here is Johnny Cash watching HR Haldeman on trial,
translation.zh:
‎所以约翰尼卡什
‎看着HR霍尔德曼接受审判

translation.en: who had been at the White House four years before
for Johnny's White House performance.
Haldeman turned to John and said,
"I'm sorry. I let you down."
If Johnny were here today,
and he is in spirit,
he'd play that song.
I'm going to go request it to be played
on the airwaves,
because that message in that song, "What is Truth,"
translation.zh:
‎因为那首歌里的讯息
‎“真相是什么”

translation.en: needs to be heard today.
[John Carter] It was not long after his performance at the White House
that Dad released the song "Man in Black."
And if you want to understand what my dad stood for,
translation.zh: ‎如果你想理解我父亲的立场

translation.en: the words to the song "Man in Black" exemplify that.
♪ I wear the black for the poor And the beaten-down ♪
translation.zh: ‎我为穷苦潦倒之人穿着黑衣服

translation.en: ♪ Livin' in the hopeless Hungry side of town ♪
translation.zh: ‎他们挣扎在绝望和饥饿边缘

translation.en: ♪ And I wear it for the prisoner ♪
♪ Who has long paid for his crime ♪
translation.zh: ‎他们已经为自己的罪行付出长久代价

translation.en: ♪ But still is there because He's the victim of the times ♪
translation.zh: ‎但他们仍然是时代的牺牲者

translation.en: ♪ I'm the man in black ♪
